Issue.creator: caod
Issue.summary: Configtx package should not allow setting signing identity for channel transactions
Issue.description: After a conversation with ~jyellick Â it was made clear that the MSP initialization for verifying and signing share the same paths hence we use the same type containing a signing identity for both. The signing identity is not actually supposed to be used for either the channel creation transaction or for the system channel genesis block and definitely should not be updatable in a config update transaction. We should go ahead and remove all support for setting the signing identity in the configtx package.
